casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Milton Kirton (13988)

Dupont, C. J., and Schaller and Spear, Js.

Argued May 31 decision released June 27, 1995 Earle Giovanniello, with whom, on the brief, was Beverly G. Carswell, for the appellant (defendant). Christopher T. Godialis, deputy assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were Donald A. Browne, state’s attorney, and Joseph Harry, assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
